001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
010
011import java.util.Objects;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * Identifies the occurrence of a sequence used a function argument or return
017 * value.
018 */
019public enum Occurrence {
020  /**
021   * An empty sequence.
022   */
023  ZERO("", true, Occurrence::handleZero),
024  /**
025   * The occurrence indicator {@code "?"}.
026   */
027  ZERO_OR_ONE("?", true, Occurrence::handleZeroOrOne),
028  /**
029   * No occurrence indicator.
030   */
031  ONE("", false, Occurrence::handleOne),
032  /**
033   * The occurrence indicator {@code "*"}.
034   */
035  ZERO_OR_MORE("*", true, Occurrence::handleZeroOrMore),
036  /**
037   * The occurrence indicator {@code "+"}.
038   */
039  ONE_OR_MORE("+", false, Occurrence::handleOneOrMore);
040
041  @NonNull
042  private final String indicator;
043  private final boolean optional;
044  @NonNull
045  private final ISequenceHandler sequenceHandler;
046
047  Occurrence(@NonNull String indicator, boolean optional, @NonNull ISequenceHandler sequenceHandler) {
048    Objects.requireNonNull(indicator, "indicator");
049    this.indicator = indicator;
050    this.optional = optional;
051    this.sequenceHandler = sequenceHandler;
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Get the occurrence indicator to use in the signature string for the argument.
056   *
057   * @return the occurrence indicator
058   */
059  @NonNull
060  public String getIndicator() {
061    return indicator;
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Determine if providing a value is optional based on the occurrence.
066   *
067   * @return {@code true} if providing a value is optional or {@code false} if
068   *         required
069   */
070  public boolean isOptional() {
071    return optional;
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Get the handler used to check that a sequence meets the occurrence
076   * requirement.
077   *
078   * @return the handler
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  public ISequenceHandler getSequenceHandler() {
082    return sequenceHandler;
083  }
084
085  @NonNull
086  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZero(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
087    int size = sequence.size();
088    if (size != 0) {
089      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
090          null,
091          String.format("an empty sequence expected, but size is '%d'", size));
092    }
093    return ISequence.empty();
094  }
095
096  @NonNull
097  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleOne(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
098    int size = sequence.size();
099    if (size != 1) {
100      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
101          null,
102          String.format("a sequence of one expected, but size is '%d'", size));
103    }
104
105    T item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
106    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(item);
107  }
108
109  @NonNull
110  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZeroOrOne(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
111    int size = sequence.size();
112    if (size > 1) {
113      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
114          null,
115          String.format("a sequence of zero or one expected, but size is '%d'", size));
116    }
117
118    T item = sequence.getFirstItem(false);
119    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(item);
120  }
121
122  @NonNull
123  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZeroOrMore(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
124    return sequence;
125  }
126
127  @NonNull
128  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleOneOrMore(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
129    int size = sequence.size();
130    if (size < 1) {
131      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
132          null,
133          String.format("a sequence of one or more expected, but size is '%d'", size));
134    }
135    return sequence;
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Used to check that a provided sequence matches an associated occurrence
140   * value.
141   */
142  @FunctionalInterface
143  public interface ISequenceHandler {
144    /**
145     * Check that the provided sequence matches the occurrence.
146     * <p>
147     * This method may return a new sequence that more efficiently addresses the
148     * occurrence.
149     *
150     * @param <T>
151     *          the sequence item Java type
152     * @param sequence
153     *          the sequence to check occurrence for
154     * @return the sequence
155     * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
156     *           if the sequence doesn't match the required occurrence
157     */
158    @NonNull
159    <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handle(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence);
160  }
161}
